itions,  determine  the  truth  values  of  the  following  compound
propositions:
1.  ~XY9. ~(A(ZX))
2.  ~(XY)                                10. ~(A~(ZX))
3.  ~(ZZ)                                 11. ~A~(ZX)
4.  ~(Z~Z)                              12. ~Z(Z& A)
5.  ~ ~(AB)                             13. ~(Z(Z& A))
6.  (AZ) & B14. ~((Z    Z) & A)
7.  (AX) & (BZ)                 15.A((~B& C)    ~(~B~(ZB)))
8.  (A& Z)  (B& Z)                 16.A& ((~B& C)    ~(~B~(ZB)))
Exercise XII
